sentences: David Rosenboom (born September 9, 1947 in Fairfield, Iowa) is an American composer and a pioneer in the use of neurofeedback, cross-cultural collaborations and compositional algorithms.
He is currently Professor of Music and Dean of the School of Music at the California Institute of the Arts.
His pre-CalArts students include Jin Hi Kim.
Rosenboom married Nicola Voss on December 19, 2014.
Jacqueline Humbert And David Rosenboom: J. Jasmine: My New Music (Unseen Worlds, 2018)
